Program 20 (issue 11) - "The New Aladdin’s Lamp” - Sir Walter Puckey, expert on
automation, discussed this new production technique
developed by the electronic tube, the Aladdin’s Lamp of
the 20th Century,

DATELINE EUROPE (57-2)
Due to problems involved in getting tapes across the At3.antic, programs four, five
and six of this series have been delayed* Thereforey there will be no programs
in this series with your shipments of Issues 4 and 5; however, programs 4 and 5
are being shipped with Issue #6. When piogram 6 arrives we will ship it as soon
as possible.
*********************
